name: Shockwave
descriptionPower: Choose up to 3 targets on different squares, each exactly 1 move away. Deal 1 damage to each target.
descriptionAlternativePower: Deal 1 damage to all targets that are exactly 1 move away.

name: Zx-2
descriptionPower: Deal 1 damage and 2 marks to 1 target you can see.
descriptionAlternativePower: Choose up to 3 targets you can see and deal 1 mark to each.

name: Shotgun
descriptionPower: Deal 3 damage to 1 target on your square. If you want, you may then move the target 1 square.
descriptionAlternativePower: Deal 2 damage to 1 target on any square exactly one move away.

name: Sledgehammer
descriptionPower: Deal 2 damage to 1 target on your square.
descriptionAlternativePower: Deal 3 damage to 1 target on your square, then move that target 0, 1, or 2 squares in one direction.

name: Rail Gun
descriptionPower: Choose a cardinal direction and 1 target in that direction. Deal 3 damage to it.
descriptionAlternativePower: Choose a cardinal direction and 1 or 2 targets in that direction. Deal 2 damage to each.

name: Power Glove
descriptionPower: Choose 1 target on any square exactly 1 move away. Move onto that square and give the target 1 damage and 2 marks.
descriptionAlternativePower:
Choose a square exactly 1 move away. Move onto that square. You may deal 2 damage to 1 target there.
 If you want, you may move 1 more square in that same direction (but only if it is a legal move). You may deal 2 damage to 1 target there, as well.

name: Furnace
descriptionPower: Choose a room you can see, but not the room you are in. Deal 1 damage to everyone in that room.
descriptionAlternativePower: Choose a square exactly one move away. Deal 1 damage and 1 mark to everyone on that square.

name: Hellion
descriptionPower:
Deal 1 damage to 1 target you can see at least 1 move away.
Then give 1 mark to that target and everyone else on that square.
descriptionAlternativePower:
Deal 1 damage to 1 target you can see at least 1 move away.
Then give 2 marks to that target and everyone else on that square.

name: Flamethrower
descriptionPower:
Choose a square 1 move away and possibly a second square 1 more move away in the same direction.
 On each square, you may choose 1 target and give it 1 damage.
descriptionAlternativePower: Choose 2 squares as above. Deal 2 damage to everyone on the first square and 1 damage to everyone on the second square.

name: Electroscythe
descriptionPower: Deal 1 damage to every other player  on your square.
descriptionAlternativePower: Deal 2 damage to every other player  on your square.

name: Tractor Beam
descriptionPower: Move a target 0, 1, or 2 squares to a square you can see, and give it 1 damage.
descriptionAlternativePower:
Choose a target 0, 1, or 2 moves away from you.
 Move the target to your square  and deal 3 damage to it.
